instructions: From any Home screen, tap the Menu key. Tap System settings . If necessary, tap the Menu key to switch to list view. Tap Bluetooth . Tap the Bluetooth switch to turn it it on. The phone scans for available devices. Select a device to pair with. Verify the passkey. Tap Pair . On the other device, accept the pairing.

From any Home screen, tap the Menu key. Tap System settings . If necessary, tap the Menu key to switch to list view. Tap Bluetooth . Tap the Bluetooth switch to turn it it on or off. On: The switch turns blue and moves right to the ON position. Off: The switch turns gray and moves left to the OFF position,.
